mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.appointment_date, a.start_time, a.end_time, a.status, a.create_time, s.seat_num, r.room_name, f.floor_name FROM bas_appointment a LEFT JOIN bas_seat s ON a.seat_id = s.id LEFT JOIN bas_study_room r ON s.room_id = r.id LEFT JOIN bas_floor f ON r.floor_id = f.id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
